name: STRIKERS 1945 (2020)
description:
Easy to play, simple and challenging
The masterpiece of the "Psikyo Shooting"!

Strikers 1945 is a vertical-scrolling shooter game that first appeared in arcades in 1995.

Battleships and tanks transform into amazing machines!
In the exciting boss battles, the legendary "Psikyo Bullets" will aim at you!

Let's go, Strikers!
Boarding a fighter plane, across the sea, across the sky, and beyond...
Stop this secret organization from taking over the world!

You can set the difficulty level, life, number of continuations,
key assignments, screen orientation, and more.

In addition, online rankings have been implemented!
Aim to be the world's best Striker!

Features of the machine

  • World War II-era fighters are here, and you can take on six different types with different performance!
  • Power up with "P" items, sub-weapons added.
  • Get bombs with the "B" item to wipe out enemy bullets and evade emergencies!
  • Unleash the formation attack with a takedown attempt!

Features of "ARCADE" mode
  • 7 levels of difficulty can be selected for beginners.
  • Harder than the arcade version "HARD" and "VERY HARD" are implemented. We need a challenger!
  • Support local rankings on all difficulty levels and all own machines.

Features of the options
  • Vertical screen mode that allows you to play in arcade style!
  • Select the screen filter from the normal +2 version.
  • You can set the number of lives from 1 to 9 and the number of continues from 0 to unlimited.
  • Freely assign "Shot", "Auto Shot" and "Bomb" in the key configuration.
  • The vertical screen mode can be operated in the horizontal state as well! Feel like a horizontal shooter?

Features of the "SCORE ATTACK" mode
  • New implementation! Severe mode with fixed difficulty level and number of lives.
  • Send your high scores and score attacks against players from all over the world!
  • Online rankings can be viewed from the options menu.
